channel.title: [ MUST SEE ]RS2 REMAKE [ Hyperion ][ Need Coder ]
channel.description:
[size=24pt][shadow=red,left]Our Aim[/shadow][/size]
The servers aim here is to remake runescape from a base that I still havent Decided but am willing to take advice!
[shadow=red,left]What We Are Coding:[/shadow] What I will need coders for: I will be needing coders for many stuff including the following- *NPC All in right places *Tutorial Island completely coded *all npc dialogue's coded like real RS2 *Proper Door's *most RS accessable while walking *Following cat's (from RS2)[Gertrude's Cat-Quest] + loads more but will mention after Having the coders
[shadow=pink,left]Spot's Availiable:[/shadow]
Client Coder (x1-2) -- (needed) -- (Backup) Mod (x3)--(apocalypsePk)--(needed) Admin(x2)--(needed)--(3lv3n sniper) Server Coders (x2)-- (needed) -- (needed)---> GFX Designer(x1)--(needed), HTML Coder(x1)--(needed)
[shadow=red,right]How To apply:[/shadow]
[shadow=green,left]HTML Coder:[/shadow] [code]Name: MSN: Experience: Proof(a template): about you:(optional)[/code]
* Cannot request hosts, even in development teams.
[shadow=red,left]Mod & admin's:[/shadow]
[code]Name: Mod or Admin?: Country: Why You?: Msn: About you:[/code]
[shadow=red,left]Coder:[/shadow]
[code]Name: Msn: Coded servers(show proof): About you:[/code]
[shadow=limegreen,left]GFX Desginer:[/shadow]
[code]Name: Coutry: A sample: Msn: About you:[/code]
[shadow=red,left]Client Coder:[/shadow]
[code]Name: Country: Are you good at coding clients?: Msn: About you:[/code]
[size=24pt]Media Still To Come[/size]
[size=33pt]Make Sure To leave a comment on Which Base To use[/size]

item.title: [ MUST SEE ]RS2 REMAKE [ Hyperion ][ Need Coder ]
item.dc:creator: @The_Exclusive The Exclusive
item.description:
@The_Exclusive wrote:

[quote=“xVhincex, post:10, topic:381029”]If you’re going to supposedly ‘remake RuneScape’
you should stick with A revision, like

377 with no bullshit 474+ Content
just a clean 377 cache.
Just a suggestion, cause most people have been trying to ‘remake RuneScape’
and are failing HARD.

My recommendation is to use Hyperion. Very stable base
It’s advanced, and you can do a lot of things with it. (I’m using that base)
Although, Hyperion is a scratch source and doesn’t have Trade or NPC Combat. (Just sayin’)
Hyperion also has different revisions like, Hyperion 474 and Hyperion 525.

As they said up there, RuneSource is a good base , just as stable too.
If you are having trouble coding Hyperion, I suggest using RuneSource then.

Please, PLEASE not another Project Insanity project?![/quote]thanks then[quote=“krackkid, post:11, topic:381029”]Name: Chris
Coutry: American
A sample: There are some on the forums just look or add my msn.
Msn: krackkid@live.com
About you: Add my msn we can talk.[/quote]ohk will doo

Read full topic

item.title: [ MUST SEE ]RS2 REMAKE [ Hyperion ][ Need Coder ]
item.dc:creator: @xVhincex xVhincex
item.description:
@xVhincex wrote:

If you’re going to supposedly ‘remake RuneScape’
you should stick with A revision, like

377 with no bullshit 474+ Content
just a clean 377 cache.
Just a suggestion, cause most people have been trying to ‘remake RuneScape’
and are failing HARD.

My recommendation is to use Hyperion. Very stable base
It’s advanced, and you can do a lot of things with it. (I’m using that base)
Although, Hyperion is a scratch source and doesn’t have Trade or NPC Combat. (Just sayin’)
Hyperion also has different revisions like, Hyperion 474 and Hyperion 525.

As they said up there, RuneSource is a good base , just as stable too.
If you are having trouble coding Hyperion, I suggest using RuneSource then.

Please, PLEASE not another Project Insanity project?!

Read full topic
